$description

empty.title: No entries
empty.subtitle: You have no entries in your history.

export.title: Export as CSV
export.subtitle: Export your history as a CSV file. This will include all of your parking spots.

delete.title: Delete all entries
delete.subtitle: Delete all entries in your history.

empty.shared_parkings: You have no shared parking spots.

distance_calculation.title: How are we calculating the distance?

my_car.title: My Car

built.title: Year of manufacture: $baujahr ($jahre Jahre)
built.subtitle: Change the year of manufacture of your car.
built.validate_null: Please enter a valid year of manufacture.
built.validate_year: Please enter a valid year of manufacture between 1900 and $year

driven.title: $km km driven
driven.subtitle: Change the mileage of your car.

plate.title: License plate: $plate
plate.subtitle: Change the license plate of your car.

park_name.title: Title: $name
park_name.subtitle: Change the title of your car, e.g., Mercedes, Audi or BMW.

tuv.title: MOT until $date
tuv.subtitle: Change the MOT date of your car.
tuv.help: Choose the "1." of the month, e.g., "1.1.2022"
tuv.calender_content:
Your MOT has expired! Please make an appointment.

Best regards,
Your WoAuto-Team
tuv.expiring_info: Your MOT will expire soon! Please make an appointment.

my_car.secure_notice: Your private car data is stored locally on your device. We do not have access to your data. You can also delete your data at any time in the settings.

page_1.title: Welcome to WoAuto
page_1.content_1: With WoAuto you can save your parking spot and view it later, share it with others and even navigate to it.
page_1.content_2: Your parking spot is safe and always stays on your device.
page_1.content_3: Save your parking spot in just 2 clicks.

page_2.parking_title: Set a name for your car
page_2.parking_content: Give your car a cool name
page_2.theme_content: Choose the theme you like best
page_2.location_content: In order for WoAuto to save your location, you must allow real-time location permission. This is necessary to find your parking spot and load the map.
page_2.location_checkbox_error: Please allow the app to query your location while using the app.

locked.title: Did you lock your car?
locked.subtitle: This is a reminder if you locked your car

shared_parking.title: A shared online parking space has been added
shared_parking.subtitle: Check the map or the list.

distance_calculation.title: How is the distance calculated?
distance_calculation.subtitle: Distance is calculated using the Haversine formula. The formula is a special form of the Pythagorean formula used to calculate the distance between two points on a sphere. The formula is also known as "sphere distance".

na.title: Notifications are not available
na.subtitle: notifications are not available on your device

denied.title: Notifications access denied
denied.subtitle: You have denied notifications access. Please go to settings and allow notifications.

expiring.title: Your parking ticket is about to expire
expiring.subtitle: In about $minutesLeft minutes your parking ticket will expire, slowly prepare to leave.

sync.title: Sync parking spot
sync.subtitle: Do you want to sync the parking spot?

synced.title: Parking spot synced
synced.subtitle:
This parking spot is now on WoAuto's servers.
Would you like to share the parking spot?

sharing.title: Sharing parking spot
sharing.subtitle: Have this QR code scanned to share your location

driving_mode.title: Driving mode detected
driving_mode.subtitle: You are (probably) driving your car right now. Do you want to switch to the driving mode?

location_denied.title: Location permission denied
location_denied.subtitle: You have denied location permission. Please go to settings and allow access to your location.

info.title: History
info.subtitle: This will show you the last 15 parking spaces

delete.title: Delete all entries
delete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete all entries?

leave_info.title: Leave App
leave_info.subtitle: Are you sure you want to leave the app?

app_info.title: App Info
app_info.subtitle: This app was developed by Emre Yurtseven, is open-source and of course available on Github.

feedback.title: feedback
feedback.subtitle: Feel free to email me, join our Telegram channel, or send me a private message on Telegram:

data_security.title: Privacy Policy and Legal Notice
data_security.content_1: Brief summary of privacy policy in our own words (as of 01/09/2023):
data_security.content_2: - The app communicates with Google Maps to display the map.
data_security.content_3: - The app communicates with my VPS server on German soil to display, create and manage synchronized parking spots.
data_security.content_4: - The app does not store any metadata, such as IP address, device name, or operating system version.
data_security.content_5: - The app stores, of course, among other things, your location, the name of the parking lot and the coordinates, but gives them
data_security.content_7: A data exchange with my server and with the servers of Google, when providing the Google Maps maps, takes place.
data_security.content_8: The app otherwise stores all data only on your device and you can delete them at any time, then they are also deleted from my server (in the settings at the bottom).

app_data.title: Delete App Data
app_data.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete all app data?

theme.title: Theme
theme.subtitle: Choose the theme you like best.

map_type.title: Map type
map_type.subtitle: Choose the map type you like best.

traffic.title: Traffic
traffic.subtitle: Show the current traffic situation on the map.

park_ticket.title: Parking ticket time buffer
park_ticket.subtitle: Set a time buffer so you have time to renew the ticket or return to the car before the parking ticket expires.

driving_mode.title: Driving Mode Detection
driving_mode.subtitle: Set how fast you need to drive for the app to detect driving mode.

credits.title: Credits
credits.subtitle: Thanks to Google Maps API and of course to the Flutter community.

share.title: Share App
share.subtitle: Why not share the app with your friends and family?
share.share_content:
Did you also forget where you parked last? No more. With WoAuto you can easily save your parking spot and view it later, share it with others and even navigate to it.
Your parking spot is safe and always stays on your device.

Why don't you download it and try it out for yourself? https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.emredev.woauto

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.subtitle: Do you have any suggestions for improvement, bugs or anything else to say?

data_security.title: Privacy and Legal Notice
data_security.subtitle: Learn how your data is protected.

app_data.title: Delete all app data
app_data.subtitle: Press and hold here to delete all your app data.
